label: sourceRelatedParty
comment: A source related party for this TT aggregation event.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, group, or body related to a Track and Trace (TT) process.

domainIncludes.comment: Information about an event that captures the relationship between one or more physical or digital objects identified by identifiers, such as an EPC (Electronic Product Code) or EPC class, that are fully or partially consumed as inputs or as outputs.
